statements: SELECT * FROM editorial_calendar WHERE status = 'published';
SELECT author_name, content_title FROM editorial_calendar WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_title, author_name, publication_date FROM editorial_calendar WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendar WHERE status = 'draft' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS total_articles FROM editorial_calendar GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT id, content_title, author_name, publication_date, status FROM editorial_calendar WHERE status = 'published' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT content_title FROM editorial_calendar WHERE author_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY content_title ASC
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendar WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND status = 'draft' ORDER BY publication_date ASC
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM editorial_calendar GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY total_posts DESC
SELECT MAX(publication_date) AS latest_publication_date FROM editorial_calendar
SELECT * FROM EditorialCalendars;
SELECT calendar_id, calendar_name FROM EditorialCalendars WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT schedule_name, content_type, publish_date FROM ContentSchedules ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_name, content_type FROM ContentSchedules WHERE publish_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT calendar_name, start_date, end_date FROM EditorialCalendars WHERE calendar_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM EditorialCalendars WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY calendar_name DESC;
SELECT calendar_name, start_date, end_date FROM EditorialCalendars WHERE calendar_id = 5;
SELECT schedule_name, content_type FROM ContentSchedules WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EditorialCalendars ec JOIN ContentSchedules cs ON ec.calendar_id = cs.schedule_id;
SELECT calendar_id, calendar_name, start_date, end_date FROM EditorialCalendars ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EditorialCalendar ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC;
SELECT id, content_title FROM ContentSchedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-08-15';
SELECT workflow_name, status FROM PublishingWorkflow WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT month, year FROM EditorialCalendar WHERE year = 2023 ORDER BY month DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContentSchedule WHERE content_type = 'Article' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM EditorialCalendar WHERE month = 'January' AND year = 2022;
SELECT id, content_title, content_type FROM ContentSchedule WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, workflow_name FROM PublishingWorkflow WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT month, year FROM EditorialCalendar ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC;
SELECT Count(*) AS Total_Content FROM ContentSchedule WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendars;
SELECT calendar_name, start_date FROM editorial_calendars ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, content_title, scheduled_date FROM content_schedules WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, workflow_name, status, assigned_to FROM publishing_workflows WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM editorial_calendars WHERE id = 1;
SELECT calendar_name, start_date, end_date FROM editorial_calendars WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, calendar_name, start_date, end_date FROM editorial_calendars ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, content_title, author_name, scheduled_date FROM content_schedules WHERE scheduled_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM publishing_workflows WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM EditorialCalendars;
SELECT calendar_name, start_date, end_date FROM EditorialCalendars WHERE publisher_id = 'abcd-1234';
SELECT * FROM ContentSchedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT title, publish_date FROM PublishedContent WHERE publisher_id = 'xyz-5678';
SELECT name, email FROM Publishers WHERE website LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM EditorialCalendars ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC
SELECT calendar_name, start_date, end_date FROM EditorialCalendars WHERE publisher_id = '<publisher_uuid>'
SELECT * FROM ContentSchedules WHERE status = 'published' AND schedule_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT cw.workflow_id, cw.status, pc.title FROM ContentSchedules cs INNER JOIN PublishingWorkflows cw ON cs.content_id = cw.content_id INNER JOIN PublishedContent pc ON cs.content_id = pc.content_id
SELECT pc.title, pc.publish_date, p.name FROM PublishedContent pc INNER JOIN Publishers p ON pc.publisher_id = p.publisher_id
